name: Sling (pacmenco)
description:
Precision, timing and endurance are key in this fast paced endless arcade game!

Game Features 

• Unlock new balls to customize your character! 

• Aiming, jumping from platform to platform while avoiding obstacles and much more! 

• Easy and hard gamemodes for every occasion!

• Highly competitive for you who want to sharpen your skills! 

• Game Center high scores!

• Challenge yourself with the near impossible! 

- Can you beat the world?
